s.text: The book marshaled mountains of evidence to show that Hill was telling the truth when she said Thomas sexually harassed her and that Thomas was lying when he denied it.
The book marshaled mountains of evidence to show that Hill was telling the truth when she said Thomas sexually harassed her and that Thomas was lying when he denied it.
Which would you rather be--a powerful Republican with a lovely, caring spouse or a lonely Democratic loser, a feminist with no life?
